product.title: Aria Beauty Insta Styler Ceramic Hair Curler, Curling Iron, Black, 1 Inch
product.description: The Insta Styler Ceramic Hair Curler is a dual voltage curling wand, ideal for travelers around the globe. With fast and effortless styling, it works wonders on all hair types, presenting no need for professional expertise. This hair curling iron is equipped with a specialized Japanese cooling fan that sets your curls instantly as you style, ensuring lasting results.
product.description_html: The Insta Styler Ceramic Hair Curler is a dual voltage curling wand, ideal for travelers around the globe. With fast and effortless styling, it works wonders on all hair types, presenting no need for professional expertise. This hair curling iron is equipped with a specialized Japanese cooling fan that sets your curls instantly as you style, ensuring lasting results.
product.description_full:
The Insta Styler Ceramic Hair Curler is a dual voltage curling wand, ideal for travelers around the globe. With fast and effortless styling, it works wonders on all hair types, presenting no need for professional expertise. This hair curling iron is equipped with a specialized Japanese cooling fan that sets your curls instantly as you style, ensuring lasting results. * Designed for dual voltage to assist you on your travels anywhere in the world
 * Can also be used as a heat wand curler to straighten and smooth hair in a single pass
 * This lightweight curling iron never snags or pulls hair
 * The protective outer casing of this split barrel curling iron prevents burns to countertops
 * Comes with an automatic safety shut-off feature for added security
product.description_full_html:
The Insta Styler Ceramic Hair Curler is a dual voltage curling wand, ideal for travelers around the globe. With fast and effortless styling, it works wonders on all hair types, presenting no need for professional expertise. This hair curling iron is equipped with a specialized Japanese cooling fan that sets your curls instantly as you style, ensuring lasting results.

  • Designed for dual voltage to assist you on your travels anywhere in the world
  • Can also be used as a heat wand curler to straighten and smooth hair in a single pass
  • This lightweight curling iron never snags or pulls hair
  • The protective outer casing of this split barrel curling iron prevents burns to countertops
  • Comes with an automatic safety shut-off feature for added security

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
